title: Altar (disambiguation)
content:
This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.

Altar may refer to:

Main article: Altar

Runic altars[edit | edit source]

Main article: Runic altar

Altars used to craft runes.

Locations of altars[edit | edit source]

Elemental[edit | edit source]

Elemental runic altars can be accessed with the appropriate talisman or tiara. Players can use an elemental talisman or elemental tiara to access them all rather than having one of each type.

The ring of the elements can teleport players near the elemental runic altars.

Runic altar Location Map
Air South of Falador.
Water In the Lumbridge Swamp, or south-east of Draynor Village.
Earth North-east of Varrock, near the Lumber Yard.
Fire North-east of Al Kharid, outside the Duel Arena.

Catalytic[edit | edit source]

Catalytic runic altars can be accessed with the appropriate talisman or tiara, though not all require one. Players can use a catalytic talisman or catalytic tiara to access them rather than having one of each type.

Some catalytic runic altars require the completion of quests to access and craft runes upon.

Runic altar Location Map
Mind Between Ice Mountain and Goblin Village.
Body Between Ice Mountain and Barbarian Village, south of Edgeville Monastery.
Cosmic The southern part of Zanaris.

Requires completion of the quest Lost City.

Chaos Level 9 Wilderness, south-east of the Dark Warriors' Fortress.
Astral South-east end of Lunar Isle. No talisman is required.

Requires completion of the quest Lunar Diplomacy to use.

Nature North of Shilo Village.
Law Northern part of Entrana; players cannot possess certain items to island.

Requires completion of the quest Troll Stronghold to access.

Death Bottom level of the Temple of Light. Also accessible from the Underground Pass.

Requires completion of the quest Mourning's End Part II to access.

Blood Inside the Meiyerditch Laboratories.

Requires completion of the quest Sins of the Father to access.

Blood (Kourend) South of the Dark Altar. No talisman is required.

Requires 100% Arceuus favour to use.

Soul East of the dense essence mine. No talisman is required.

Requires 100% Arceuus favour to use.

Wrath South of the Myths' Guild through the Corsair Cove Dungeon.

Requires completion of the quest Dragon Slayer II to access.

Ourania Within the Ourania Cave north of the Observatory. No talisman is required.
